typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		set_num as string,
		name as string,
		year as short,
		theme_id as short,
		num_parts as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LegoSetsSource
LegoSetsSource alterRow(deleteIf(year<2000)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 aggregate(groupBy(year),
	num_parts = toDecimal(avg(num_parts), 10, 2)) ~> AvgNumberParts
LegoSetsSource sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OutputLegoParts
